languages.text: "И ты так легко сдаешься, старик?! Ладно святоша, у нее сердца нет, но ты?! Как бы не так! Я докопаюсь до того, кто виновен в смерти Лорд-капитана! Докопаюсь и тогда..." {n}Идира сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Этот ублюдок пожалеет о том, что родился на свет!"

traits.locale_text: "И ты так легко сдаешься, старик?! Ладно святоша, у нее сердца нет, но ты?! Как бы ни так! Я докопаюсь до того, кто виновен в смерти Лорд-Капитана! Докопаюсь и тогда..." {n}Идира сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Этот ублюдок пожалеет о том, что родился на свет!"

languages.text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"
languages.original_text: "И ты так легко сдаешься, старик?! Ладно святоша, у нее сердца нет, но ты?! Как бы не так! Я докопаюсь до того, кто виновен в смерти Лорд-капитана! Докопаюсь и тогда..." {n}Идира сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Этот ублюдок пожалеет о том, что родился на свет!"

traits.locale_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

"You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

languages.text: “你这么快就放弃了吗，老家伙？我知道那个修女肯定会放弃，因为她就是个没心没肺的人，可就连你都放弃了吗？噢，不！我一定会查清楚！我会揪出那个杀害了舰长大人的人！等我找到凶手……“{n}伊迪拉捏紧了拳头。{/n}“我会让那个人渣后悔生在这个世界上！”
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: “你这么快就放弃了吗，老家伙？我知道那个修女肯定会放弃，因为她就是个没心没肺的人，可就连你都放弃了吗？噢，不！我一定会查清楚！我会揪出那个杀害了舰长大人的人！等我找到凶手……“{n}伊迪拉捏紧了拳头。{/n}“我会让那个人渣后悔生在这个世界上！”

languages.text: «¿Tan fácilmente se rinde, anciano? Me lo esperaba de la hermana, no es como si tuviera sentimientos... pero ¿usted? ¡No! ¡Llegaré al fondo de esto y encontraré a quienquiera que haya asesinado a la Lord Capitán! Y cuando lo haga...». {n}Idira aprieta los puños.{/n} «¡Haré que lamente el día que vino al mundo!».
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tan fácilmente se rinde, anciano? Me lo esperaba de la hermana, no es como si tuviera sentimientos... pero ¿usted? ¡No! ¡Llegaré al fondo de esto y encontraré a quienquiera que haya asesinado a la Lord Capitán! Y cuando lo haga...». {n}Idira aprieta los puños.{/n} «¡Haré que lamente el día que vino al mundo!».

languages.text: 「そんなに簡単に諦めるんだね、爺さん？あたいはシスターに同じくらい期待してた…別にシスターに心があるわけじゃないが。でも、あなたは？ああ、まったく！あたいはこの事件の真相を突き止めて、ロード・キャプテンを殺した人物を見つけ出す！そしたら…」{n}イディラは拳を握り締めた。{/n}「あのクズめは生まれてきたことを後悔する！」
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに簡単に諦めるんだね、爺さん。私は妹に同じくらい期待してた…妹に心があるわけじゃないけど…でも、あなたは？ああ、違う！私はこの問題の真相を突き止めて、ロード・キャプテンを殺した人物を見つけ出す！そして私がそうするときは…」{n}イディラは拳を握り締めた。{/n}「あのクズは生まれてきたことを後悔するだろう！」
「そんなに簡単に諦めるんだね、爺さん？あたいはシスターに同じくらい期待してた…別にシスターに心があるわけじゃないが。でも、あなたは？ああ、まったく！あたいはこの事件の真相を突き止めて、ロード・キャプテンを殺した人物を見つけ出す！そしたら…」{n}イディラは拳を握り締めた。{/n}「あのクズめは生まれてきたことを後悔する！」

languages.text: « Vous abandonnez déjà, vieillard ? Ça ne m'aurait pas étonné de la part de la sœur, vu qu'elle n'a pas de cœur, mais vous ? Certainement pas ! Je ferai toute la lumière sur cette affaire, je trouverai le meurtrier de la seigneure-capitaine ! Et à ce moment-là... cette ordure regrettera d'être née ! » {n}termine Idira en serrant les poings.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous abandonnez déjà, vieillard ? Ça ne m'aurait pas étonné de la part de la sœur, vu qu'elle n'a pas de cœur, mais vous ? Certainement pas ! Je ferai toute la lumière sur cette affaire, je trouverai le meurtrier de la seigneure-capitaine ! Et à ce moment-là... cette ordure regrettera d'être née ! » {n}termine Idira en serrant les poings.{/n}

languages.text: "So leicht gebt Ihr also auf, alter Mann? Von der Schwester hatte ich das erwartet – sie hat schließlich kein Herz – aber von Euch? Oh, nein! Ich werde der Sache auf den Grund gehen und herausfinden, wer für den Mord am Lord Captain verantwortlich ist! Und dann ..." {n}Idira ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Wird dieser Abschaum den Tag seiner Geburt bereuen!"
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: "So leicht gebt Ihr also auf, alter Mann? Von der Schwester hatte ich das erwartet – sie hat schließlich kein Herz – aber von Euch? Oh, nein! Ich werde der Sache auf den Grund gehen und herausfinden, wer für den Mord am Lord Captain verantwortlich ist! Und dann ..." {n}Idira ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Wird dieser Abschaum den Tag seiner Geburt bereuen!"

languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

languages.text: "Bu kadar kolay mı pes ediyorsun ihtiyar? Rahibe söylese şaşırmazdım, katı yürekli olduğu malum... Ama sen? Hayatta olmaz! Bu vakayı çözeceğim. Lord Kaptan'ın katilini bulacağım! Bulduğumda da..." {n}İdira, yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n} "O şerefsizi doğduğuna doğacağına pişman edeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "You'd give up so easily, old man? I expected as much from the sister — it's not like she has a heart — but you? Oh, no! I'll get to the bottom of this, I'll find the one responsible for murdering the Lord Captain! And when I do..." {n}Idira clenches her fists.{/n} "That scum will regret the day they were born!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar kolay mı pes ediyorsun ihtiyar? Rahibe söylese şaşırmazdım, katı yürekli olduğu malum... Ama sen? Hayatta olmaz! Bu vakayı çözeceğim. Lord Kaptan'ın katilini bulacağım! Bulduğumda da..." {n}İdira, yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n} "O şerefsizi doğduğuna doğacağına pişman edeceğim!"
